text: We're taking a different route to minimize ALR, ensuring RPA overwatch. They're checking their RWR and ECM systems to avoid triggering the IADS. It's critical that we don't expose the AO during ingress. We've ensured all FLOT markers are accurate and synced with GPS.
prompt: The audio file may contain the following terminology, listed here for your convenience: ALR, RPA, RWR, ECM, IADS, AO, FLOT, GPS, FL, RTB, Zulu, ISR, PID, BDA, ATO, CAS, TOT, JTAC, IFF, TACAN, RPA, ID, CAS, ATO, FLOT, OBJ, AWACS
